name: Classic Inca Trail To Machupicchu 4 Days / 3 Nights
description:
This is the most popular and frequented Trail. Trail booking at Peru´s National Cultural Institute INC is not changeable or refundable! Maximum 500 people per day hike this trail.

This 4 day hike takes you through mystic cloud forest and over high andean passes. You visit old Inka sites on the way and after 42 km finally reach 'Inti Punku', the Sun gate to get the first view of Machu Picchu.
